name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Help
Because Twitter has restricted all third-party applications
My phone and computer are currently unable to save videos in [Private Messages].
I am currently asking for help from everyone if there is any third-party application that can save videos in [Private Messages], any system is fine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Please note that it is to save the video in the [Private Message]. Please test it yourself before sending it to me. Because I have tested all the ways you think you can save it, and none of them work.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Start using the submission email address 
tougaolilaoshi@hotmail.com
For your safety, please do not use domestic email addresses to send submissions to me

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @TwitterSupport Please add to “save the video” in Direct Messages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The problem has been temporarily resolved.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 3, a real estate practitioner released a video. At an internal meeting, real estate agents from all over the country generally said that the price of second-hand houses fell by about 20%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens in the comment area said that new houses dare not drop in price, but they will come with decoration and parking spaces, which is a disguised 20% discount. The transaction price of second-hand houses is generally lower than the listing price.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Many friends have sent me private messages saying that Hotmail is not safe for submissions. So, you can suggest which email address is safe in private messages, and I will use the one with the highest number of likes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Protect our home"
July 3, Haitang Xinyuan Community, Xujing Town, Qingpu District, Shanghai.
Without reaching a consensus, the owner and the neighborhood committee property management arranged for the renovation team to forcefully enter the community and attempt to demolish the wall facade without the owner's consent, and clashed with the residents of the community
People shouted "Protect our home" and "Get out"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 2, a Xiaohongshu netizen encountered Peng Shuai, who had not been seen for a long time, at the National Tennis Center.
It is reported that Peng Shuai's last public appearance was in February 2022 during the Winter Olympics to watch Gu Ailin win the championship.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On July 4, a section-level civil servant in Suizhou City, Hubei Province, who had served as a NPC deputy and NPC Standing Committee member, reported in his real name that he was retaliated against by Suizhou City’s disciplinary inspection and supervision cadres and NPC leaders.
Some netizens lamented that when even NPC deputies cannot solve the problem through legal means and need to seek justice through the Internet, what should ordinary people do?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @ratnazzzx If you post it in this situation, it is very likely to expose your identity, so if you want to say it, you can tell me or others in a private message, but whether to post it depends on whether you can bear the risk.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @wuxiaobo1968 Don't be a jerk to me with your fake account

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 4, a blogger posted that the owner of the "100,000+ Hot Articles" public account was summoned by Yangzhou police across provinces and returned home about seven hours later.
It is reported that he forwarded an article on "Yangzhou police suspected of rape" on June 30, and the article only had 200 views.
